text: We need an international investigation into the Covid-19 epidemic.  It has already cost too many lives and will take many more.  We cannot allow cover-ups or lies to put us all at risk. Even now, false data from Beijing is undermining our ability to respond.

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela

domain.name: Politician
domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden
